des:
With B.One VoiceAct skills for Alexa, you can control a broad range of smart Switches, Dimmers, Sockets/Outlets,Connected Lights, Thermostats and Actions with your voice commands. B.One VoiceAct also allows control of Infrared enabled devices such as Televisions, Airconditioners, Disc Palyers and such others.

B.One VoiceAct can control Smart Switches, Dimmers, Sockets/Outlets, Connected lights, Groups of Lights, Thermostats and Actions from your voice commands. For more details about the list of devices that B.One and its VoiceAct Skills support, visit http://b1hub.com/syncswith.html
Smart Switches and Sockets/Outlets of Z-wave and Zigbee from GE, Leviton, Aeotec, Fibaro and more. : 
 Alexa, turn on entrance switch
 Alexa, turn off entrance switch
 Alexa, turn off television socket
 Alexa, turn on television socket
Connected Lights, Groups of Lights from Philips and Dimmers of Z-Wave and Zigbee from GE, Leviton, Aeotec, Fibaro and more. : 
 Alexa, set the dining room lights to 25%
 Alexa, turn off dining room lights.
 Alexa, turn on dining room lights.
 Alexa, turn on fan
Alexa, set fan to 40%
Alexa, turn off fan
Alexa, turn on fan

Thermostats of Zigbee and Z-wave from Honeywell, Fidure, 2Gig:

 Alexa, set bedroom temperature to 70 degrees
 Alexa, decrease the bedroom temperature
 Alexa, increase the bedroom temperature

Actions are a group of activities performed across various devices in your smart home using B.One hub. With B.One VoiceAct, you can control Actions as below:

Alexa, turn on good morning
Alexa, turn off good morning
Alexa, turn on party mode

This skill allows you to control your smart devices without saying Ask B.One or Tell B.One. 
For example, if you have named your smart switch as entrance switch, you can say Alexa, turn on entrance switch to control this smart switch.

Steps to configure B.One VoiceAct

1. Tap the "Enable" button

2. Enter your B.One App account’s username and password

3. After successfully connecting to your B.One account, talk to your Echo and say, "Alexa, discover my devices".

Note: When using the skill, you need to specify the name of switch, Socket/Outlet, Dimmer, Light bulb, thermostat or Action you want to use. Device names can not be changed from VoiceAct.


For more details please visit www.b1hub.com
